browser extension

Create a browser extension for text-selection queries on 3rd party sites, by modifying the selecton extension (MIT license).

Todo's:

  • Have the extension also work for PDFs and self-hosted iframes (issue opened)

Future potential ideas:

  • Named-entity detection and display (for the selected text)
  • Wikidata URL-format match detection (to link web pages to Wikidata entities).
